# Backpacked

Backpacked adds a very simple backpack into the game. It allows you to store additional items. The backpack is perfect for storing items you need at all times as when you die you will not lose your backpack and it's contents. The backpack is equiped by putting the backpack into the corresponding slot in your inventory. Once equiped, simply press B on your keyboard to open and close. To craft a backpack, use the same shape as a chest but using leather instead.

### Features:
* Simple and straightforward
* Adds nine slots of additional storage
* You keep your backpack on death along with it's contents (can be turned off in config)
* Optional support for Curios API
